resources.string: 1. This app works only if app is running(either in foreground or background).
" So, when you plugged in charger open this app, leave it in background and do your work or leave phone behind(it's up to you, one way or other app works)."
2. But first you have to make sure that app will not get killed by your phone due to battery optimization.
" To ensure app is running without any problem turn off the battery optimization for this app (If you are using this app for the first time)."
" Goto Settings(in your phone)->Apps List->Charge Notifier->Battery Optimization and choose 'don't optimize' or some option that means same."
" We made our app in this way because if app continuosly checks whether your phone is charging or not throughout the day it will consume more battery."
